snippet: The two-year deal with Stabaek makes Bob Bradley, 55, the first American head coach of a top-tier European soccer team.
abstract: Bob Bradley, former national team soccer coach for the United States and Egypt, signs two-year deal to become manager of Norwegian club Stabaek; deal is first in which an American coach will head a top-tier European soccer team.
lead_paragraph: The two-year deal with Stabaek makes Bob Bradley, 55, the first American head coach of a top-tier European soccer team.

headline.main: Bradley, Former U.S. and Egypt Coach, Joins Norwegian Club
headline.print_headline: Former U.S. Coach Joins Top-Tier Norwegian Club

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
